ai-patthana15.54:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.54:0.3_0: He should attain the skillful and leaves on the side of the skillful.
ai-patthana15.54:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give up the skillful qualities that should be given up by developing the skillful. You shouldn’t give up the cause or condition for the sake of developing.
ai-patthana15.54:2.1_0: Developing the teaching should be given up by development, no unskillful qualities should be given up. ...
ai-patthana15.54:2.1_2: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana15.54:3.1_0: You should not give up any unproclaimed development, without development, be given up, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana15.54:3.1_2: What is not the reason for two reasons.
